item.title: Episode 72: Unhandled Exceptions - With Callum Linington
item.description:
throw new UnhandledExceptionPodcast("Episode 72: Exceptions - With Callum Linington");

In this episode, I was joined for a second time by Callum Linington - this time to discuss exceptions, which is quite fitting given the show’s name! We chatted about why you should avoid using exceptions for your main business logic and control flow, and explored better ways to handle errors.
